title: "Working Through Wavelength Ratios"
output:
  github_document: default
always_allow_html: true
---

```{r, echo=F, message=F, include=F}
devtools::load_all(".")
source('../code/plot.R')
```

```{r, echo=F, message=F, include=F}
chord = c(60) %>% mami.codi(
  period_tolerance = 0.1,
  verbose=T, 
  num_harmonics=10
)
```

```{r, echo=F, message=F}
chord %>% dplyr::select(
  consonance_dissonance, 
  major_minor
)
```

#### Temporal

```{r, echo=F, message=F}
chord %>% dplyr::select(
  frequency_gcn,
  frequency_lcd,
  frequency_consonance
)
```

```{r, echo=F, message=F}
chord$frequency_ratios[[1]]
```

#### Spatial

```{r, echo=F, message=F}
chord %>% dplyr::select(
  period_gcn,
  period_lcd,
  period_consonance
)
```

```{r, echo=F, message=F}
chord$period_ratios[[1]]
```
